plot: The Saiyajin named Taurus has come to Earth in order to plant a tree that will both destroy the planet and give Taurus strength a hundred-fold. Son Goku and the Z Warriors cannot let this happen and duke it out with Taurus's group for the sake of the planet.
opening_theme: "Rock the Dragon" by ??? [Ocean Dub TV Version]
